---
title: "Table1 with gtsummary"
---

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
table1_params$dfADVS %>% 
  dplyr::filter(.data$PARAMCD == "MAP",
         .data$"VISIT" == "VISIT1",
         .data$"VSTPT" == "PREDOSE") %>%
  gtsummary::tbl_summary(
    include = c(AVAL), 
    type = list(AVAL = "continuous")
  )
```
